entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
